h3.style: font-weight: normal; border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(26, 81, 137); margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding-bottom: 5px;

p.span: Welcome to Santa Cruz City Schools!

It is my honor to continue to serve as your Superintendent. As a learning organization, one of the shared commitments that inspires our professional collaboration is the goal to continually improve our services and supports for students and families, and it is in this spirit that I want to share our district’s ongoing and future work.

span.a: Click Here to Read the Full Message from the Superintendent

h3.style: font-size: 26px; font-weight: normal; border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(26, 81, 137); margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding-bottom: 5px;

font-size: 26px; font-weight: normal; border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(26, 81, 137); margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding-bottom: 5px;

div.div:
133 Mission Street Suite 100
Santa Cruz, CA 95060

div.p: Santa Cruz City Schools does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. Santa Cruz City Schools also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
Our vision is to create and support a learning environment that challenges and enables students to achieve their highest potential.
